kurianbenoy/whisper_normalizer.summary: Recent activities in the whisper_normalizer repository have focused on resolving issues with broken links. A push event and a corresponding pull request were made on November 26, 2024, to update the broken citation link in the EnglishSpellingNormalizer class to point to the archived version of the UK-US spelling list, thereby maintaining data accuracy and integrity.

profile_summary:
Kurian Benoy is a skilled developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as C and Python. He has a proven track record of leveraging his technical expertise to deliver high-quality solutions, and his proficiency in using Jupyter Notebook has enabled him to work efficiently on data-driven projects. As a dedicated professional with a large network of 215 followers, Kurian has established himself as a reliable and knowledgeable developer who is committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the field.

With a portfolio of 173 public repositories, Kurian has consistently demonstrated his ability to design, develop, and deploy innovative software solutions that meet the needs of his clients and community. His expertise in programming languages and data analysis tools has allowed him to make significant contributions to the development of various projects, and his commitment to excellence has earned him a reputation as a talented and results-driven developer. As a seasoned professional with a strong technical background, Kurian is well-equipped to tackle complex challenges and provide effective solutions that drive success in the ever-evolving technology landscape.
